name: WEEKEND.WAD
description: HERETIC DEATHMATCH WAD (MY DOOM ][ WEEKEND.WAD CONVERTED) After playing many, good Deathmatch PWADS, and building a couple, I decided to build a fast, high-frag DeathMatch wad. It has a central, open 'arena' to battle in with surrounding passageways, a couple of dark shortcuts and NO shortage of weapons or ammo. You will amass MANY, MANY frags here!!!!!
